Subject: Re: Cybertronian Fire - Getting My Heart Eaten
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Headstrong/Sinnertwin

Headstrong leapt back frantically as the flames passed through the first
few mirror images. "Clever as ever Hot Spot *SNORT" He said, furiously. He
took to the air, the five images mimicking him exactly, and he shot two
balls of energy at Hotspot.

Sinnertwin absorbed the dammage from First Aid, and continued his decent,
until the last moment when an unknown figuere tackled him out of the way.
Sinnertwin fell on his back, and then leapt away to regroup with his
comerades, transforming into Abominus's leg. The lone robot stood up, and
gave a hand to First Aid to help him up. "Are you gonna be okay?" The robot
asked kindly. He wore the markings of the Autobots. The missiles continued
and hit the Leg Sinnertwin had formed, but did little dammage due to the
protection of his heavy armor.
